text:
Lane | Integration Developer (NodeJS + Postgres), Server Dev (NodeJS + Postgres), Front End Web Dev (React), Mobile Dev (React Native), Customer Success | Full Time Onsite Toronto

Lane is a Tenant Experience platform to modernize office buildings providing a connected community with a layer of technology. We are in the Techstars Toronto program right now, and just closed out first $1M seed round.

- Ground floor at a fast growing startup - Really awesome team so far! - Venture backed! - Work on the latest tech stacks - Have a huge impact on our team and product as we scale out!

https://www.joinlane.com/careers or careers@joinlane.com
